modName: Shrouded Hood High-Res and Blood-Faded Texture
summary:
Deadly Serious Shrouded Armor inspired.
Higher resolution using Bethesda\'s HighResPack.
descriptionHtml:
First things first, THIS MOD REQUIRES:
[url=file.php?id=2260]Deadly Serious Shrouded Armor[/url]

[center]
This file retextures doomfunk\'s (Deadly Serious Games) Shrouded Armor hood into a higher-resolution, blood-stained version that matches the vanilla armor fairly well.

As amazing as the mod stated above is, I eventually felt like reverting to the vanilla Shrouded Armor thanks to the Bethesda\'s High Resolution Pack. However, I wasn\'t going to let my character walk around with the original hood (as those of you who have DS Shrouded Armor would know) I used Bethesda\'s hi-res Warlock Hood and retextured it to fit the red and black shrouded armor.[/center]

INSTALLATION

[b]1.[/b] Place \"Data\" file in your Skyrim directory:
\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\"

[b]2.[/b] Overwrite \"dbarmor_hood.dds\" and \"dbarmor_hood_n.dds\"

[b]3.[/b] To revert to the hi-res vanilla Shrouded Armor you must delete all the files from the following path [u][b]EXCEPT[/b][/u] for the ones that have the \"word\" hood in them: 
\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\dbarmor\"

MY OTHER MODS:

[url=file.php?id=9241]Build-A-Dwarven Army[/url]
Forge and heal Automatons to fight for you!

[url=file.php?id=8915]Peryite\'s Blessing - A Special Shout[/url]
Lots-a-puke for your enemies.
author: esiotrot291117
